title: "error: no override and no default toolchain set" Can anyone help me?
selftext:
Hello,

today I installed CRUX 3.6 on my laptop, after installing dwm, I was trying to compile librsvg (rust app, dependency of adwaita-icon-theme and other themes), but as the title says, error: no override and no default toolchain set. I installed rust via [http://rustup.rs](http://rustup.rs)

​

Can anyone help me?

Thanks
